div.p: QWZ designed the study, conducted the literature search, extracted and analyzed data, drafted the manuscript, and is the corresponding author. LGL contributed to the critical revisions of the manuscript. WCY co-designed the study and co-developed the full text of the review, and is the co-corresponding author. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.

sec.p: The authors declare that they have no competing interests.
All data used in this systematic review are fully available in the public domain.

sec.div: Ethics approval and consent to participate
